subject: Re: [Samba] Samba 3.0.25rc2 Available for Download
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Lars, I think you were the last one to touch the Makefile here.



jerry

Thomas Bork wrote:

> [...]
> Compiling auth/auth_script.c
> Building plugin bin/script.so
> make: *** No rule to make target `nsswitch/libnss_winbind.so', needed by
> `all'.  Stop.
> deveis # make install
> [...]
> make: *** No rule to make target `nsswitch/libnss_winbind.so', needed by
> `all'.  Stop.
> 
> 
...
> --without-winbind \
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^




cheers, jerry
